mdx.excerpt: In April and May 2016, when I was working out the design for xi editor, I wrote a series of Google-internal posts I entitled "rope science", which dug into some of the advanced computer science concepts I was hoping to employ to make xi better, as well as some more speculative explorations. I hadâ€¦
